text: Priyan (April 1964 - 9 November 2017) was an Indian cinematographer. He has worked on Tamil language movies. He was born in Virudhunagar, Tamil Nadu. His best known works are Porkkaalam (1997), Desiya Geetham (1998), Vetri Kodi Kattu (1999), Thenali (2000), Star (2001) and Majunu (2001). Priyan died of a heart attack in Chennai, India on 9 November 2017 at the age of 53. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1964 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Indian cinematographers
title: Priyan
